scripts.build: npm run napi:docker && npm run strip
scripts.napi:docker: docker-compose build napi-rs && docker-compose run -T --rm napi-rs cat index.linux-x64-gnu.node > index.linux-x64-gnu.node
scripts.resources:build: docker-compose build resources && docker-compose run -T --rm resources tar -czvf - resources > resources.tar.gz
